overview:
Chris Gregan is the Chief Architect at PlayFirst, Inc. and has over 14 years experience developing advanced software products in the games and eCommerce industries. He is responsible for ensuring that PlayFirst’s technology and game creation tools match the vision of its talented creative team. In 2008 he co-founded PlayFirst’s international office in Dublin and has been a key architect of PlayFirst’s mobile technology strategy, helping the team to overcome technical challenges and deliver high quality chart topping mobile games. Prior to PlayFirst, Gregan worked for Instinct Technology where he developed cutting-edge graphics and games middleware technology. He also founded Itec, an eCommerce consultancy company whose clients included Creative Labs, Lafferty Group, Wizard Office Supplies, Meath County Council, An Post and Ensoft Solutions.

Gregan received a B.A. Mod in Computer Science (1st Class) from Trinity College Dublin and was awarded a Gold Medal on graduation for academic achievement.
